title.narrative: Local Government Engineering Department capacity building and oversight - PASA

description.narrative: (Bangladesh): .USAID will partner with the U.S. Army Corps of Engineers to provide technical support to the Bangladesh Local Government Engineering Department (LGED) to improve agriculture infrastructure in the Feed the Future Zone of Influence. The U.S. Army Corps of Engineers will provide technical oversight support to LGED for engineering and environmental processes, and build LGED's capacity to implement infrastructure management practices, improve quality control and quality assurance programs, standardize designs, and conduct environmental due diligence. With this oversight and guidance from the U.S. Army Corps of Engineers, LGED will improve and construct market centers, renovate village roads that strategically link production to markets, and improve farm-level irrigation and drainage systems. This technical support for agricultural infrastructure development will lead to improved infrastructure and increased crop diversification and aquaculture outputs...The Army Corps of Engineers has excellent capacity in infrastructure development and this activity was selected as the most efficient mechanism to provide technical support to LGED. This activity supports the Global Food Security Strategy, the State-USAID Joint Strategic Plan Goals Two and Three, and the U.S. Government's mission objective of improved food security in Bangladesh..

participating-org.narrative: U.S. Government - Department of the Army
